name: Per Contra
description:
Welcome to our page where you can play the latest update of Per Contra while it's still in progress.

Per Contra is a low poly puzzle game where you control 2 separated pieces that move in opposite directions, the goal of the game is to reunite them, to achieve this you must complete different levels that test your spatial skills.

_____________________________________________________________

DEVELOPERS

  • Gamba04 
  • R_to_Restart
  • Nespumoso

PER CONTRA IS  STILL A WORK IN PROGRESS
